import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; //npm install bootstrap import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js'; import React from "react"; const Room = () => { const [numCamera, setNumCamera] = useState(0); const [numSensor, setNumSensor] = useState(0); let numActive=0; let alert=0; const addcamera = () => { setNumCamera(prevNum => prevNum + 1); }; const addsensor = () => { setNumSensor(prevNum => prevNum + 1); }; return (

Room 1

{numCamera}

{numSensor}

Active Camera:

{numActive}

Number of Alerts:

{alert}

) } export default Room;
